channel.title: When I click "Run" on a server or source it pops up fast and goes away why?
channel.description: When I click "Run" on source or server it pops up fast the closes, every server/source I download is the same way, I cannot figure it out, can someone please helpl me.

item.title: When I click "Run" on a server or source it pops up fast and goes away why?
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“Microsoft1, post:19, topic:355608”]Oh it’s version 18 o.o would that matter? :D[/quote]Yes rofl.

In your variables, change the 17’s to 18.

item.source: When I click "Run" on a server or source it pops up fast and goes away why?

item.title: When I click "Run" on a server or source it pops up fast and goes away why?
item.dc:creator: @i_pk_girls i pk girls
item.description:
@i_pk_girls wrote:

Change [code]
CLASSPATH:CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_17\bin;%CLASSPATH%;

PATH:C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_17\bin;[/code] to [code]
CLASSPATH:CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_18\bin;%CLASSPATH%;

PATH:C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_18\bin;[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: When I click "Run" on a server or source it pops up fast and goes away why?
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“Microsoft1, post:12, topic:355608”]@echo off
title server
java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server

Is inside the source file/Run Batch[/quote]Environmental Variables mate. You can try Lins’ Environmental Variable setter, and if all else fails, put the direct path to java.exe

[quote=“Microsoft1, post:15, topic:355608”]Alright, I have CLASSPATH and PATH

CLASSPATH:CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_17\bin;%CLASSPATH%;

PATH:C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_17\bin;[/quote]And you have jdk version 17?

Read full topic

CLASSPATH:CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_17\bin;%CLASSPATH%;

item.title: When I click "Run" on a server or source it pops up fast and goes away why?
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

[quote=“Microsoft1, post:12, topic:355608”]@echo off
title server
java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server

Is inside the source file/Run Batch[/quote]
As I said before, you didn’t set your environmental variables correctly. Try again.

item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“Microsoft1, post:9, topic:355608”]So what do I need to do? I’m sorry, I’m lost… I changed the variables yet it did nothing…[/quote]Then your batch file is wrong. Post what’s inside. It should NOT be
‘C:/Program Files/etcetc’

If that’s in there, replace it with ‘java’
